1370: Lutghardis moved to Coppelstraet.A.6 after marriage.
Got married to Stoethoute at age 23 in 1370.
1374: Gave birth to Agnes in 1374 at age 27.
1375: Gave birth to Sarre in 1375 at age 28.
1376: Gave birth to Hadewigis in 1376 at age 29.
1378: Gave birth to Swegero in 1378 at age 31.
1379: Gave birth to Mabelie in 1379 at age 32.
1380: Lost daughter Hadewigis when Hadewigis was 5 years old.
1382: Gave birth to Riet in 1382 at age 35.
1383: Gave birth to Isbrandus in 1383 at age 36.
1385: Lost daughter Sarre when Sarre was 11 years old.
1388: Gave birth to Hilduardis in 1388 at age 41.
Lost son Isbrandus when Isbrandus was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
